hud-message.failed-set-font: {{fontType}} set failed. See SMAPI console for details.
hud-message.export-fail: Failed to export font! See SMAPI window for details.
ui.main-menu.title: Font Settings
ui.main-menu.font-type-help.paragraph:
There're mainly three types of fonts in Stardew Valley:
- Small Font
- Medium Font
- Dialogue Font
Press the left or right arrow to switch.
You may only set one or two, or all of them, based on your liking.
ui.main-menu.font-type-help.latin-lang.p:
Latin Language:
You're under a latin language ({{locale}}).
To edit the dialogue font, go to configuration and check the "Enable custom dialogue font in latin languages" box.
ui.new-preset-menu.title: New Preset
ui.new-preset-menu.name: Name
ui.preset-info-menu.name: Name
ui.export-menu.title: Export Settings
config.color-format:
Format: R G B A
e.g. Indigo Blue (R=63, G=72, B=204, A=255)
 => 63 72 204 255
config.text-color-dialogue.description: Configues game default dialogue text color.
config.shadow-color.description: Configues game default text shadow color.
config.enable-latin-dialogue-font: Enable custom dialogue font in latin languages
config.enable-latin-dialogue-font.descri: Whether to enable custom dialogue font in latin languages. Latin Language: language that only contains latin characters. Current ({{locale}}) is a latin language: {{isLatinLanguage}}
config.edit-mode.description:
Edit mode if checked, or load mode.
Edit mode enhances mod compatibility, avoids conflicts when multiple mods load same font.
config.edit-prio.description:
Priority to edit fonts. The large the value, the later fonts get edited.
Range: [{{minValue}}, {{maxValue}}]
Default: 0
config.font-menu-key.description: Key-binding to open a font settings menu.
config.example-text.description: Custom sample text. Keep this unset unless you really want yours, the mod has its built-in one.
config.min-font-size.description: Min reachable value of font size UI control.
config.max-font-size.description: Max reachable value of font size UI control.
config.min-spacing.description: Min reachable value of spacing UI control.
config.max-spacing.description: Max reachable value of spacing UI control.
config.min-line-spacing.description: Min reachable value of line spacing UI control.
config.max-line-spacing.description: Max reachable value of line spacing UI control.
config.min-offset-x.description: Min reachable value of X-offset UI control.
config.max-offset-x.description: Max reachable value of X-offset UI control.
config.min-offset-y.description: Min reachable value of Y-offset UI control.
config.max-offset-y.description: Max reachable value of Y-offset UI control.
config.min-pixel-zoom.description: Min reachable value of pixel zoom UI control.
config.max-pixel-zoom.description: Max reachable value of pixel zoom UI control.
misc.mod-file-not-found: Cannot find "{{filePath}}", which is a part of mod files. Download this mod again may fix the problem.
